ygData.subject: Hidden Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: I have seen many posts that have Brad McQuaid (or however you spell his name :) ) saying that there are hidden items all over Norrath that have yet to be
ygData.messageBody:
I have seen many posts that have Brad McQuaid (or
however you spell his name :) ) saying that there are
hidden items all over Norrath that have yet to be
discovered. It also says that when enough people
discover them, they will be made available to all
players.
This leads me to believe that "possibly" this 49th level
#7 SK only spell may fall in that group. I guess we just
need to go to Fear and kill Cazic-Thule. Heh. Hmmm. I
think I would get a massive faction hit on that one. :)
Brian if you are still out there, could you shed some
light on this?

--
Cronik Khaos <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
15th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous


> From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...>
>
> There may indeed be hidden spells for all hybrids, or
> maybe they were in development and got dropped, but
> left in the file there. I wonder if maybe they will
> be added to the Temple of Solusek as quest only spells?
>
> Xilith
>
